CONTENTS.P: Selection was conducted through the Quality and Cost Based Selection (QCBS) method as stated under the relevant World Bank’s Guidelines: Selection and Employment of Consultants under IBRD Loans and IDA Credits & Grants by World Bank Borrowers issued in 1.2011.
On 28.12.2016, Request for Proposal was sent to the following 6 Consultants in accordance with the Consultants’ Short List approved by the European Investment Bank on 21.12.2016:
JV Highway Institute JSC, Serbia (JV leader)
JV Project Biro Utiber doo, Serbia (JV leader)
JV AIC Progetti SpA, Italy (JV leader)
JV Técnica y Proyectos, SA (TYPSA), Spain (JV leader)
JV CPS Ingenieros SL, Spain (JV leader)
